A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed laughing and laughed considerably more than I had in any other Star Wars movie. It had its few and very short powerful moments\, but contained a lot of filler\, some of which made me laugh. Disney is divorcing from Star Wars so they can do what they want with it. I dont consider these new films to be Star Wars at all. They make me smirk but that's all.
